template<typename T, size_t N>
class aligned_allocator

Public Types

template<>
using value_type = T
template<>
using reference = T&
template<>
using const_reference = const T&
template<>
using pointer = T *
template<>
using const_pointer = const T *
template<>
using size_type = size_t
template<>
using difference_type = ptrdiff_t

template<typename T>
struct ECSComponent : public BaseECSComponent
#include <ecs_component.h>

ECS Component We are using âCuriously recurring template patternâ In order to get static variables in every derived component class

Template Parameters

  • T: the component class itself

  • T: component class

  • T: component class

  • T: Component

mat4 perspective(float fov, float aspect, float z_near, float z_far)

Creates Perspective projection matrix https://www.codeguru.com/cpp/misc/misc/graphics/article.php/c10123/Deriving-Projection-Matrices.htm

Return

projection matrix

Parameters

  • fov: field of view

  • aspect: proportional relationship between view volumeâs width and height

  • z_near: near clipping plane. All coordinates that are in front of the near plane will not be drawn

  • z_far: far clipping plane. All coordinates behind far plane will not be drawn

mat4 ortho(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float z_near, float z_far)

Creates Orthographic projection matrix https://www.codeguru.com/cpp/misc/misc/graphics/article.php/c10123/Deriving-Projection-Matrices.htm

Return

projection matrix

Parameters

  • left: coordinate of the ortho frustum

  • right: coordinate of the ortho frustum

  • bottom: coordinate of the ortho frustum

  • top: coordinate of the ortho frustum

  • z_near: near clipping plane. All coordinates that are in front of the near plane will not be drawn

  • z_far: far clipping plane. All coordinates behind far plane will not be drawn

log_info_cmd(...)Â¶

I know that this is bad C++ code, but unfortunately I canât use FILE / LINE predefined macroses outside of another macros context. Iâve tried to use std::experimental::source_location, but itâs very hard to mix variadic arguments with default value for source_location. Details_01: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52977593/stdexperimentalsource-location-at-compile-time Details_02: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4196431/passing-the-caller-file-line-to-a-function-without-using-macro/28742116 Modified https://github.com/rxi/log.c
